name: Sushi Cats (Games@MQ)
description:
Sushi Cats is a tower defence game (for Android, WebGL and PC) set in a sushi train restaurant. The player needs to use the cats arriving at the restaurant to eat all of the sushi being sent out, and to minimise food waste so the restaurant doesn't go out of business.

If you'd like to play the game in browser, you can check out the creators' game page here: https://bokchoywithsoy.itch.io/sushi-cats-test.
